documentFirst.dataFisrt: The Main Goal of this Document is the deep Respect and mutual Agreement between the two people exposed in it. This Proposal shall be ageed totaly.
documentFirst.dataSecond: The First Grantor must treat the Second Grantor with deep Respect and Care. As the Second Grantor is a Lady, she's the Owner of this Document.
documentFirst.dataThird: The First Grantor, must do anything without The Second Grantor consent signed in this Document. Security is essential till the end of the process.
documentFirst.dataFour: The Second Grantor has the rigth to stop the process if She feels herSelf hurt, pressed or dominated.
